      • getRoundCornorImage

        android.graphics.Bitmap getRoundCornorImage(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                            int roundPixels)
        制作圆角图片
        参数:
        bitmap -
        roundPixels -
        返回:

      • createVideoThumbnail

        android.graphics.Bitmap createVideoThumbnail(java.lang.String path,
                                             int kind)
        Create a video thumbnail for a video. May return null if the video is corrupt or the format is not supported.
        参数:
        path - the path of video file
        kind - could be MINI_KIND or MICRO_KIND

      • extractThumbnail

        android.graphics.Bitmap extractThumbnail(android.graphics.Bitmap source,
                                         int width,
                                         int height)
        Creates a centered bitmap of the desired size.
        参数:
        source - original bitmap source
        width - targeted width
        height - targeted height

      • extractThumbnail

        android.graphics.Bitmap extractThumbnail(android.graphics.Bitmap source,
                                         int width,
                                         int height,
                                         int options)
        Creates a centered bitmap of the desired size.
        参数:
        source - original bitmap source
        width - targeted width
        height - targeted height
        options - options used during thumbnail extraction

                             int x,
                             int y,
                             float r)
        光晕效果
        参数:
        bmp -
        x - 光晕中心点在bmp中的x坐标
        y - 光晕中心点在bmp中的y坐标
        r - 光晕的半径
        返回:
